title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:29 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: win 3.1M2 we upgraded pygments because there was a newer version released or we needed a new feature ?  
00:29 <@sdumitriu> Newer version  
00:30 <@cjdelisle> if you read that in the release notes, keep in mind they're not done yet at all and they're really just a clone of the milestone 1 release notes  
00:30 <@cjdelisle> BTW: can I get a volunteer to update wikimatrix?  
00:34 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisle: Me  
00:34 <@sdumitriu> Just the version number and release date, right?  
00:35 <@sdumitriu> Or no, also the JDK version  
00:35 <@cjdelisle> Thanks  
00:35 <@sdumitriu> Date, 24 or 25?  
00:36 <@cjdelisle> 24th IMO  
00:36 <@cjdelisle> The files are made  
00:37 <@sdumitriu> Done wikimatrix  
00:38 <@sdumitriu> Since we updated the JDK version, maybe we should update the Servlet specification version?  
00:38 <@sdumitriu> It would be cool to require servlets 3.0  
00:38 <@cjdelisle> hmm  
00:38 <@cjdelisle> XWIKI-6599: Support for suggestion sources to provide custom icon/images for individual result entry  
00:39 <@cjdelisle> having some trouble turning that into something regular people will understand  
00:40 <@cjdelisle> I'll just put that and XWIKI-6635 in misc without any other info

11:04 <evalica> has quit  
11:42 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisle: Where's you public gpg key?  
11:44 <@sdumitriu> The one on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/cjdelisle#Attachments is not the one you used for signing the tag  
11:51 <vmassol> guys I'm adding a new component in jira for platform since there's  
11:51 <vmassol> noone for resources  
11:51 <vmassol> actually I'm renaming "Templates" into "Web - Templates & Resources  
11:51 <vmassol> "  
11:51 <vmassol> ok?  
11:52 <vmassol> tmortagne: I think "Wiki Features" jira component should be removed. WDYT?  
11:53 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: +1  
11:56 <+tmortagne> vmassol: i'm not sure what "Wiki Features" is actually  
11:56 <vmassol> ok removing  
11:58 <+tmortagne> this category is full of things which have nothing to do with each other  
11:58 <+tmortagne> and most of them could be moved elsewhere  
11:58 <vmassol> yes it's an old categorization  
11:58 <vmassol> moving to unused  
12:01 <vmassol> I ran the BreadCrumbs tests 600 times and I couldn't reproduce the flicker I got yesterday… too bad....  
12:07 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisle: You should push your key to keys.gpg.net  
12:08 <@sdumitriu> I pushed mine and configured gpg to automatically download keys, and I can check signatures automatically  
12:25 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
13:36 <venkatesh> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
13:48 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:07 <vmassol> cjdelisle: hi. What's the status on the release (ie what' left to do ?). Thanks  
14:07 <vmassol> we need to set it up on myxwiki… anyone free for that? otherwise I'll do it  
14:10 <@cjdelisle> vmassol: I have not updated freshmeat, that and myxwiki is all that I know of.  
14:10 <vmassol> ok doing wikimatrix + freshmeat  
14:10 <vmassol> you"ve done wikipiedai right?  
14:11 <vmassol> ah wikimatrix is done  
14:11 <vmassol> doing freshmeat  
14:12 <@cjdelisle> sdumitriu did wikimatrix and I did wikipedia  
14:23 <vmassol> freshmeat done.  
14:35 <@cjdelisle> sdumitriu: did you mean http://keys.gnupg.net/ ?  
14:36 <@cjdelisle> That key I attached is a bit unsettling, it was something on my old disk drive but I can't find a metching secret key anywhere  
14:41 <@cjdelisle> Here's the one I've been using all along anyway  
14:41 <@cjdelisle> http://keys.gnupg.net:11371/pks/lookup?search=0x65B209D6&op=get  
14:57 <sburjan> has quit  
15:57 <evalica> has quit  
16:05 <vmassol> mflorea: hi  
16:05 <vmassol> we have an issue in 3.1M2 on tomcat  
16:05 <vmassol> I'm trying to upgrade myxwiki.org  
16:05 <vmassol> I get this error:  
16:05 <vmassol> INFO: validateJarFile(/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib/gwt-user-2.3.0-xwiki-20110506.jar) - jar not loaded. See Servlet Spec 2.3, section 9.7.2. Offending class: javax/servlet/Servlet.class  
16:06 <vmassol> maybe it's not a problem  
16:06 <vmassol> but still need to be checked  
16:06 <vmassol> I'm getting an important error just after (not sure it's related):  
16:06 <vmassol> SEVERE: IOException while loading persisted sessions: java.io.WriteAbortedException: writing aborted; java.io.NotSerializableException: org.xwiki.container.servlet.filters.SavedRequestManager$SavedRequest  
16:06 <vmassol> java.io.WriteAbortedException: writing aborted; java.io.NotSerializableException: org.xwiki.container.servlet.filters.SavedRequestManager$SavedRequest  
16:06 <+mflorea> gwt-user is not supposed to be in WEB-INF/lib, only gwt-servlet  
16:07 <vmassol> cjdelisle: I hope you tried 3.1M2 on tomcat :)  
16:08 <vmassol> (I didn't and I should have since sergiu reported an issue on tomcat with 3.1M1)  
16:08 <+mflorea> vmassol: some gwt-user dependency is not maraked as provided, of the artifact depending on it is not used as provided.  
16:08 <+mflorea> I can check later  
16:08 <+mflorea> s/of/or  
16:09 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:09 <Enygma`1> has joined #xwiki  
16:09 <vmassol> restarting without gwt-user in lib/
